summary: The module implements a unittest suite that runs several parameterized test cases to verify the correct behavior of the RandCoarseDropout augmentation, checking output shapes, value ranges, deterministic results with a fixed seed, and compatibility with different array types such as NumPy and PyTorch tensors.
business_intent: Ensure reliable and consistent functionality of the random coarse dropout augmentation used in medical imaging preprocessing pipelines, supporting robust model development and data augmentation quality assurance.
